name: PARAGLIDING BIG BLUE SUMMER
description: Fly high above Interlaken and Lake Thun. Our driver takes you and the pilot up the mountain with our Paragliding-Interlaken van. During the 20-minute drive you will receive the safety-talk and a briefing on the take-off and landing process.

name: BUNGY JUMP STOCKHORN INTERLAKEN
description: Stockhorn bungy located in the Swiss Alps is one of the most breathtaking and unusual bungy sites in the world.

name: MONSTER SCOOTER TOUR
description: Monster Scooters are a fun way to explore the Swiss mountain scenery with the whole family.

name: VIA FERRATA MÜRREN
description: Via Ferrata Mürren has some exposed passages and views of some of the most impressive mountain scenery in the swiss alps.

name: LAKE AND WATERFALL TOUR
description: Surrounded by mountains, forests and water, admire the beauty of this magical place while listening to stories and legends from your personal, local guide.

name: HARDER KULM PRIVATE TOUR
description: Join us for a guided trip to the Harder Kulm, top of Interlaken.
